LanguageData.CE_Apparel_PlateHelmet.label: салад
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_PlateHelmet.description: A medieval helmet that provides full coverage of the head. Somewhat protective, but restricts the wearer's field of view which affects attack accuracy.
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_GasMask.label: протигаз
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_GasMask.description: Sealed rubber mask with a filter attached. Will protect against smoke inhalation and airborne toxins.
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_ImprovGasMask.label: саморобний протигаз
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_ImprovGasMask.description: Crude gas mask fashioned from thick cloth and charcoal. Provides some limited protection against smoke and airborne toxins.
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_SimpleNightVision.label: монокуляр нічного бачення
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_SimpleNightVision.description: A simple, monocular night vision device, worn strapped to the head.
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_AdvancedNightVision.label: окуляри нічного бачення
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_AdvancedNightVision.descripti: An set of advanced night vision goggles offering detailed, panoramic vision when fighting in the dark.
